name: Optus Bank
address: 1107 Washington St, Columbia, SC 29201 (historical location, current main branch address is 1420 Main St, Columbia, SC 29201)
description: Optus Bank, formerly Victory Savings Bank, was established in 1921 and is South Carolina's first and only Black-owned bank. It focuses on providing capital loans and financial services to marginalized communities and has received significant investment from larger banks to expand its lending capacity
services: African-American-owned Retail banking in South-Carolina consultation
